title: 107_hr421
content: Home Ownership Must Expand for Teachers and Public Safety Officers Act - Amends the National Housing Act to provide purchase discount and downpayment assistance for qualifying elementary and secondary school teachers and public safety officers to buy Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD)-owned single family homes. Directs HUD field offices to conduct program awareness activities. Directs the Secretary, upon enactment of this Act, to replace the Teacher Next Door and the Officer Next Door Initiatives with the provisions of this Act.
